targets.expr: 100 * sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{kubernetes_namespace=~"$kubernetes_namespace", $type=~"$name", instance=~"$instance", area="heap"}) by (kubernetes_name, instance)/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{kubernetes_namespace=~"$kubernetes_namespace", $type=~"$name", instance=~"$instance", area="heap"}) by (kubernetes_name, instance)

100 * sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{kubernetes_namespace=~"$kubernetes_namespace", $type=~"$name", instance=~"$instance", area="nonheap"}) by (kubernetes_name, instance)/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{kubernetes_namespace=~"$kubernetes_namespace", $type=~"$name", instance=~"$instance", area="nonheap"}) by (kubernetes_name, instance)

sum(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{kubernetes_namespace=~"$kubernetes_namespace", $type=~"$name", instance=~"$instance", exception="None"}[5m]))  by (method,status,uri,kubernetes_name) / sum(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$kubernetes_namespace", $type=~"$name", instance=~"$instance", exception="None"}[5m])) by (method,status,uri,kubernetes_name)

sum(irate(http_client_requests_seconds_sum{kubernetes_namespace=~"$kubernetes_namespace", $type=~"$name", instance=~"$instance", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])) by (method,status,uri,kubernetes_name, clientName) / sum(irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~"$kubernetes_namespace", $type=~"$name", instance=~"$instance", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])) by (method,status,uri,kubernetes_name, clientName)
